sect1.title: {mailto}
sect1.para:
{mailto} automates the creation of a mailto: anchor links and optionally encodes them. Encoding emails makes it more difficult for web spiders to lift email addresses off of a site.
Technical Note
Javascript is probably the most thorough form of encoding, although you can use hex encoding too.

row.entry: The text to display, default is the e-mail address
How to encode the e-mail. Can be one of none, hex, javascript or javascript_charcode.
Email addresses to carbon copy, separate entries by a comma.
Email addresses to blind carbon copy, separate entries by a comma
Newsgroups to post to, separate entries by a comma.
Addresses to follow up to, separate entries by a comma.
Any extra information you want passed to the link, such as style sheet classes
